description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

You’re adept at piloting terrestrial vehicles. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks to use tricks during a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.iITLDCRDHyAiR3Ua]{Vehicle Chase}. Once per vehicle chase while you’re piloting a vehicle, you can perform the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.iITLDCRDHyAiR3Ua.JournalEntryPage.R1Gtge4nV39IFeZQ#double-maneuver-(full)]{Double Maneuver} action, taking a –2 penalty to each skill check rather than a –4 penalty (or no penalty if your vehicle’s full speed is at least 50 feet faster than the fastest enemy vehicle’s full speed). You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.NaGCVIyrwQsH8bV5]{Uncanny Pilot (Ex)} exploit to learn this exploit.

modifiers.name: All-Terrain Pilot
modifiers.notes: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to skill checks to use tricks during a vehicle chase.
